docs.abstract: Dr Peter D Wood article describes running in his 5th Boston Marathon; sketch (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: STANFORD, CALIF. Today, as high noon approaches at Hopkinton, Mass., a thousand contestants await the battle. Most look ahead, perhaps imagining they see the Prudential Tower, 26 miles, 385 yards into their future.
docs.snippet: STANFORD, CALIF. Today, as high noon approaches at  Hopkinton, Mass., a thousand contestants await the battle. Most look ahead, perhaps imagining they see the Prudential Tower, 26 miles, 385 yards into their future.
